name: Drug Dealer and Family Man
description:
A hard working dad quickly realizes that his honest job can't support his family. He's forced to turn to a life of crime as the cost of living seems to rise by the day.

Made for the Global Game Jam 2022. The theme was "Duality".

How to Play:

Walk up to people or places in town, see what jobs they are offering and attempt to complete them. Completing jobs will give your rewards and increase your stats. Build up your skills and do harder but more well paying jobs to stay ahead of your bills.

Make sure you balance making money with your obligations to your family, there are only so many hours in the day!

Controls:
  • W - Move towards mouse
Credits:
  • David Eichman - Programming
  • Michael Gillon - Level Design, Programming, Art
  • David Strachan - Programming
  • Alicja Ukleja - Art
